User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the Lyra application, identified by their Firebase Auth UID.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the user profile was created.

ChatSession.title: ChatSession
ChatSession.description: Represents a single chat session between a student and the AI tutor.

userId.description: The UID of the user who owns this chat session.

subject.description: The subject of the chat session (e.g., Math, Coding).

title.description: A short, AI-generated title for the chat session.

startTime.description: The timestamp when the chat session started.

Message.title: Message
Message.description: Represents a single message within a chat session.

role.description: The role of the message sender.

content.description: The text content of the message.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the message was created.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores public profile information for each user, keyed by their Firebase Auth UID.

/users/{userId}/chatSessions/{chatSessio.description: Stores metadata for each chat session belonging to a user.
Stores all messages within a specific chat session.
